title: OSIC: Understanding Laplace Log Likelihood
description: Laplace Log Likelihood Image Credits: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Laplace_distribution The evaluation metric of this competition is a modified version of Laplace Log Likelihood. Read more about it on the Evaluation Page.  This notebook explores the functioning of this metric with some examples and visualizations.
